page.title: 08FARMING (1)
page.content: MOST FARMS ARE FAMILY BUSINESSES OF AVERAGE SIZE 100 ACRES. DAIRY COWS PREDOMINATE.MILK IS SENT TO CAERPHILLY DAILY FOR CHEESE MAKING.SHEEP AND BEEF FARMS PROVIDE LIVESTOCK FOR SALE AT LOCAL MARKETS.A POULTRY FARM SUPPLIES FRESH EGGS TO THE LOCAL COMMUNITY AND NEARBY TOWNS.A BROILER UNIT SENDS LIVE CHICKENS TO HEREFORD FOR PROCESSING. A 'PICK-YOUR-OWN' ENTERPRISE PROVIDES PRODUCE FOR PICKING IN THE SUMMER. POTATOES ARE GROWN AND SOLD IN ABERGAVENNY AND OTHER LOCAL TOWNS. CEREALS ARE GROWN FOR HOME FEEDING AND SALE TO CORN MERCHANTS. CHEMICAL SPRAYS AND FERTILIZERS ARE USED TO PRODUCE CLEAN,HIGH YIELDING CROPS.
